title: No Legendary mystery skin for me??
body: my account on OCE "dera era" max level and bronze 3 52lp as of right now I literally JUST bought project yi and didn't get my mystery skin.... can I request that I do get this (unless it's been delayed) but last time one of my friend did this and he got it straight away so I just thought I'd ask about that.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Go ahead and [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) regarding this as they're the only ones who can help with account-related issues.
